feed.title: Infisical Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.111.0-postgres
entry.content:
Note: Starting with this release, database migrations will run automatically at startup. If you currently run migrations separately, you can remove this step as it is now unnecessary. More details here.

What's Changed

  • Improvement: Increase Max Error Message Size for Secret Syncs by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3095
  • Improvement: CMEK Additions and Normalization by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3093
  • feat(secret-syncs): azure app config & key vault support by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3092
  • fix: improve arn validation regex by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3097
  • Improvement: Remove Capitalizion from Breadcrumbs Container by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3100
  • Root encrypted data to kms encryption by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/2827
  • Feat/enc migration by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3102
  • Update changelog with January 2025 entries by @thomas-infisical in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3094
  • fix(api): disallow colon in secret name & allow updating malformed secret name by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3105
  • fix: arn regex validation by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3107
  • Improvement: UI Improvements & Invite User to Org from Project Invite Modal by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3108
  • Feature: Databricks Connection & Sync by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3099
  • fix(native-integrations): delete integrations from details page by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3098
  • Update auto migratiom msg by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3113
  • fix: octopus deploy integration error by @DanielHougaard in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3114
  • Fix (temp): Wrap Integrations beforeLoad in Try/Catch and RenderBannerGuard if order by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3115
  • docs: reorganize components documentation by @thomas-infisical in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3117
  • Improvement: Align Organization Options in Sidebar by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3119

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.108.1-postgres...infisical/v0.111.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.112.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improvement: Use isPending Over isLoading by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3120
  • Docs for new upgrade process by @maidul98 in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3121
  • Batch upsert operation by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3078

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical/v0.111.0-postgres...infisical/v0.112.0-postgres

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical-cli/v0.35.0
entry.content:
Changelog

  • d84bac5fb feat: changes based on reviews
  • 44f74e4d1 feat: small change
  • 11f271984 feat: updated
  • 9b44972e7 feat: added better message on heartbeat
  • f7406ea8f feat: review feedback, and more changes in cli
  • 78718cd29 feat: completed cli for gateway
  • c6b3b2431 feat: gateway in cli first version\
  • d6c1b8e30 misc: addressed comments
  • f0e6bcef9 fix: addressed rabbit findings
  • 92b3b9157 feat: added kmip server to CLI

entry.title: New release for Infisical: infisical/v0.113.0-postgres
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: removed pool config from knex and better closing in cli by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3155
  • Improvement: Increase Secret v2 Reminder Note Max Length by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3157
  • docs: remove service token deprecation warning by @thomas-infisical in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3150
  • feat: add auto redeploy for daemonset and statefulset by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3156
  • Fix: Use New Secret Key for Approval Policy Generation for Tag Resolution by @scott-ray-wilson in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3158
  • feat: added dev migration commands by @akhilmhdh in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3159
  • misc: add instance banner and consent support by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3154
  • misc: add datadog profiler by @sheensantoscapadngan in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3168

New Contributors

  • @akoullick1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/pull/3164

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Infisical/infisical/compare/infisical-cli/v0.35.0...infisical/v0.113.0-postgres
